article_title: Senate Panel Approves FERC Nominees, Keystone XL Bill
article_text:
A Senate committee voted to confirm two nominees to the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission and separately approved the Keystone XL pipeline, as the panel's chairwoman, Mary Landrieu of Louisiana, sought to assert herself on energy issues that could help her in a tough race for re-election.

Neither vote came easily, showing the degree to which...

twitter.description: A Senate committee voted to confirm two of President Barack Obama's nominees to the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission and approved the Keystone XL pipeline in a meeting that displayed partisan differences over energy.
twitter.title: Senate Panel Approves FERC Nominees, Keystone XL Bill
